mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.mainImg FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno LEFT JOIN `seller` AS c ON a.sid = c.uid WHERE b.mainImg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.rdate DESC, a.pno ASC

SELECT od.pno, pi.mainImg, p.pname, p.cate, SUM(od.pcount) AS pcount, SUM(od.price) AS price FROM `orderdetail` AS od INNER JOIN `product` AS p ON od.pno = p.pno INNER JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON od.pno = pi.pno INNER JOIN `orders` AS o ON od.ono = o.ono GROUP BY od.pno ORDER BY od.pno

SELECT od.pno, SUM(od.pcount) AS pcount, SUM(od.price) AS price, DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%y-%m') AS month FROM `orderdetail` AS od INNER JOIN `product` AS p ON od.pno = p.pno INNER JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON od.pno = pi.pno INNER JOIN `orders` AS o ON od.ono = o.ono GROUP BY od.pno, DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%y-%m') ORDER BY od.pno
